Marina Paule Ewodo (amụrụ na June 24, 1998) bụ onye French-Cameroonian basketball player
Ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Saint-Amand Hainaut Basket na French Ligue maka ụmụ nwanyị na otu egwuregwu basketball nke Cameroon.
Marina gara LJ Mermoz Montpellier High School
O meriri onye mmeri nke France na School Sport 2014 na osote onye mmeri ya na French Championship 2016.
Ọ gbara bọọlụ kọleji maka UC Riverside Highlanders, n'afọ mbụ ya, ọ nwetara akara abụọ, 1.6 nyere aka na 1.3 rebounds
O nwere egwuregwu kachasị elu nke 11 na UC Irvine Anteaters
N'afọ nke abụọ ya na 2017-18 Season, ọ nwetara akara 5.6, 2.2 nyere aka na 5.4 rebounds. N'afọ nke atọ ya, ọ nwetara akara 11.9, 2.9 nyere aka na 6.9 rebounds n'oge oge 2018 na afọ 2018
N'oge ikpeazụ ya, O nwetara akara 10.9, 2.2 nyere aka na 8.2 rebounds n'oge oge 2018 na 1919.

Marina na-egwuri egwu maka Saint-Amand Hainaut Basket na France.O sonyere na 2021 EuroCup nke umunwaanyi ebe ọ nwetara akara abụọ, 0.7 rebounds na 0.3 assists.  O nwetara akara 2.2, 1.6 rebounds na 0.3 nyere aka na 2020-21 Ligue Féminine de Basketball oge.
Marina nọchitere anya otu egwuregwu basketball nke mba Cameroon na Afrobasket ụmụ nwanyị nke 2021
Ọ nwetara akara 8.6, 4.4 rebounds na 1.4 assists. A kpọrọ aha ya na Tournaments All Star squad.
Marina bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye bụbu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Cameroon bụ Narcisse Ewodo
Nwanne ya nwanyị nke obere bụ Yohana Isabelle Ewodo na-egwu basketball ndị ntorobịa maka otu ndị France.
